summary: A fallen foot tall Homunculus called Marvin (a part human/part reptile creature) is imprisoned in a birdcage by a vengeful lover who is bidding to become the world's most powerful vampire.
cast: Phil Fondacaro|Debra Mayer|Daniel Lennox|Raelyn Hennessee|Jill Michelle|Roger Toussaint|April Gilbert|John F. Schaeffer|Harmony Rose|Jessie K. Walters|Pat Siciliano|Andrew Steiner|Brian Muir|C. Courtney Joyner|Victoria Lane|Kahlil Johnson|Ronnie Dees|James Antes|Carols Pinzon
title: Decadent Evil
